StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateCandidateEduca.onFromOssPac]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaGuidId uniqueiden..er, @OldRecSchoolGuidID uniqueiden..er, @OldRecEduca.onLevel varchar(2), @SchoolGuidId uniqueiden..er, @EDUCATION_LEVEL varchar(2), @SCHOOL_END_DATE date.me, @EDUCATION_CODE char(1), @EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE varchar(2), @PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE date.me, @VERIFICATION varchar(10), @CUMULATIVE_GPA .oat, @CURRENT_GPA .oat, @CREDIT_HOURS int, @FULL_TIME_STUDENT char(1), @IsLawSchool int, @Educa.onType char(10), @USER_LOGIN varchar(50)
AS BEGIN
-- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION
DECLARE @PersonID int; DECLARE @Educa.onID uniqueiden..er; DECLARE @OldRecSchoolCode int; DECLARE @SchoolCode int;
SELECT @OldRecSchoolCode = SCHOOL_CODE FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[HIGH_SCHOOL] WHERE rowguid = @OldRecSchoolGuidID SELECT @SchoolCode = SCHOOL_CODE FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[HIGH_SCHOOL] WHERE rowguid = @SchoolGuidId
SELECT @PersonID = MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID FROM dbo.NWA WHERE rowguid = @NwaGuidId
SELECT TOP 1 @Educa.onID = rowguid FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_EDUCATION WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID AND SCHOOL_CODE = @OldRecSchoolCode AND EDUCATION_LEVEL = @OldRecEduca.onLevel
-- STEP 2 & 3: Issue the data change statement(s), checking @@ERROR a.er each statement IF @Educa.onID IS NOT NULL BEGIN -- if already exists. UPDATE. UPDATE [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] SET SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode, EDUCATION_LEVEL = @EDUCATION_LEVEL, SCHOOL_END_DATE = @SCHOOL_END_DATE, EDUCATION_CODE = @EDUCATION_CODE, CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE = @EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE, PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE = @PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE, VERIFICATION = @VERIFICATION, CUMULATIVE_GPA = @CUMULATIVE_GPA, CURRENT_GPA = @CURRENT_GPA, CREDIT_HOURS = @CREDIT_HOURS, FULL_TIME_STUDENT = @FULL_TIME_STUDENT, IsLawSchool = ISNULL(@IsLawSchool, 0), Educa.onType = @Educa.onType, USER_LOGIN = @USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE rowguid = @Educa.onID
END ELSE BEGIN -- if does not exist. INSERT. INSERT INTO [dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[SCHOOL_CODE] ,[EDUCATION_LEVEL] ,[SCHOOL_END_DATE] ,[EDUCATION_CODE] ,[CIVILIAN_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE] ,[PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE] ,[VERIFICATION] ,[CUMULATIVE_GPA] ,[CURRENT_GPA] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid] ,[CREDIT_HOURS] ,[FULL_TIME_STUDENT] ,[IsLawSchool] ,[Educa.onType] ) VALUES ( @PersonID, @SchoolCode, @EDUCATION_LEVEL, @SCHOOL_END_DATE, @EDUCATION_CODE, @EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE, @PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE, @VERIFICATION, @CUMULATIVE_GPA, @CURRENT_GPA, @USER_LOGIN, GETDATE(), NEWID(), @CREDIT_HOURS, @FULL_TIME_STUDENT, ISNULL(@IsLawSchool, 0), @Educa.onType ) END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- STEP 4: If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
